Whangārei’s hugely popular Zonta Book Fair needs new venue https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangareis-hugely-popular-zonta-book-fair-needs-new-venue/LSWBRT6Z5ZD6VBIN5SJUY56HPI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangareis-hugely-popular-zonta-book-fair-needs-new-venue/LSWBRT6Z5ZD6VBIN5SJUY56HPI/ Mike DinsdaleNew venue needed Whangārei’s popular Zonta Book Fair sale. Sun, 12 May 2024 04:00:00 +0000 The Zonta Book Fair in Whangārei sells thousands of books in the group’s major fundraiser. But the fair needs a new venue this year and wants help to find a suitable space.
